entries.meaning: The rearing, plunging, and kicking actions of a horse trying to get rid of its rider.
examples: Then one day she went riding on her favourite horse, Coco, without a helmet, and Kwango, her prize borzoi, leapt out in front of her, causing Coco to perform an estrapade which sent Vivienne flying and falling, landing head first on the concrete drive, killing her instantly.
